title: Privakey
summary: 2-factor authentication app. I did full stack web dev, interfacing with mobile and desktop apps. Wrote fully responsive user-facing portal in Angular. Led team of 10 as Scrum Master.
tech: C#, .NET/Core, Angular, AWS, MySQL, IIS, Asana

title: EQ Music & Ambiance
summary: YouTube video collection of EverQuest 1 in-game music and ambiance.

title: D&D Campaign
summary: Campaign I've been running over 2 years for 5-6 players.
tech: Image Transmitter, Obsidian Portal, GIMP, OneNote

title: Valley of Shadow (WIP)
summary: First-person narrative puzzle game planned for a Steam release. Cast spells to solve puzzles in a dark world. I do all things technical for the game.

title: MC Lars 2: Brotherhood
summary: Rhythm platformer available on Steam, iOS and Android. Sequel to MC Lars: The Video Game. Worked on a team of 3 with 5 clients. Released in 2017.

title: Dojo Storm
summary: Top-down retro RPG available on iOS and Android. Successfully crowdfunded via indiegogo. Built external design tools to enable content creation (60+ characters, 50+ maps). Released in 2015.

title: Valley of Shadow Website
summary: Website for the Synersteel game. Fully responsive, animated, with custom newsletter subscription functionality.

title: Image Transmitter
summary: Very basic webapp, used to remotely display images via HTML.

title: Personal Website
summary: The website you are currently on. Emphasis is largely on minimalist design and animations. Regularly updated.
